mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prescription_content (prescription_id, prescription_consumption, prescription_medicine_id, prescription_frequency, prescription_num, prescription_day) VALUES (#{prescription_id}, #{prescription_consumption}, #{prescription_medicine_id}, #{prescription_frequency}, #{prescription_num}, #{prescription_day})
mapper.select: SELECT prescription_id, prescription_consumption, prescription_medicine_id, prescription_frequency,prescription_day, prescription_content_actual_unit_price,prescription_unit_price, sum(prescription_num) AS prescription_num FROM prescription_content WHERE prescription_id = #{prescription_id} GROUP BY prescription_id, prescription_consumption, prescription_medicine_id, prescription_frequency,prescription_day, prescription_content_actual_unit_price,prescription_unit_price
SELECT sum(prescription_num) FROM prescription_content WHERE prescription_id = #{prescription_id} AND prescription_medicine_id = #{prescription_medicine_id}
SELECT * FROM prescription_content WHERE prescription_id = #{prescription_id} AND prescription_medicine_id = #{prescription_medicine_id} AND prescription_num>0
